name: Zombie Jumpig
description:
This is my entry to the Java of the Dead GameJam for the Pokitto game console.

You play as a little pig that can jump between walls. Collect coffees in order to be able to attack vampires and zombies, and get money to raise your score. You are always falling and you lose energy when you jump and when an enemy hits you, and your only way to recover that energy is by defeating enemies. 

Non stop pig action!

  • Button A: Jump
  • Button B: Attack
  • Button C: Pause

Special thanks:

  • RELEVO Videogames for creating Ninja Savior.
  • Felipe Manga for creating femtoIDE and for advice.
  • Everyone in the Pokitto community for their warm welcome and support.
